selection_reasoning: Carrying forward the best historical performer (trial_2_0) and Gen 4 leader (trial_4_6) for performance, plus three diverse strategies (softmin center optimization, basin-hopping, and force-directed) for exploration and potential gains toward 2.63+.

trial_selections.reasoning: Best historical score (~2.614). Strong penalty-annealed L-BFGS-B + LP baseline to refine further.
Top of Gen 4 (2.6001). Uses explicit SLSQP with Jacobians + LP; promising constrained approach to push higher.
Mid-high score (2.5341). Softmin surrogate over centers + LP differs from SLSQP; good gradient-based variant to improve.
Basin-hopping + L-BFGS-B local steps with LP; diverse global search that may escape local minima.
Force-directed smooth energy + LP; complementary dynamics to gradient/LBFGS and may yield better edge utilization.
